edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces

Interface ReplicaCoordinator<NodeIDType>

  • Type Parameters:
    NodeIDType -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.AbstractReplicaCoordinator, PaxosReplicaCoordinator

    public interface ReplicaCoordinator<NodeIDType>
    Author:
    arun

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean coordinateRequest(Request request, ExecutedCallback callback)
      This method performs whatever replica coordination action is necessary to handle the request.
      boolean createReplicaGroup(String serviceName, int epoch, String state, Set<NodeIDType> nodes)
      This method should return true if the replica group is successfully created or one already exists with the same set of nodes.
      boolean deleteReplicaGroup(String serviceName, int epoch)
      This method should result in all state corresponding to serviceName being deleted
      Set<NodeIDType> getReplicaGroup(String serviceName)
      This method must return the replica group that was most recently successfully created for the serviceName using createReplicaGroup.

    • Method Detail

      • coordinateRequest

        boolean coordinateRequest(Request request,
                          ExecutedCallback callback)
                   throws IOException,
                          edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.reconfigurationutils.RequestParseException
        This method performs whatever replica coordination action is necessary to handle the request.
        Parameters:
        request -
        callback -
        Returns:
        False if coordinated, else the result of local Application.execute(edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.Request) invocation.
        Throws:
        IOException
        edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.reconfigurationutils.RequestParseException

      • createReplicaGroup

        boolean createReplicaGroup(String serviceName,
                           int epoch,
                           String state,
                           Set<NodeIDType> nodes)
        This method should return true if the replica group is successfully created or one already exists with the same set of nodes. It should return false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        serviceName -
        epoch -
        state -
        nodes -
        Returns:
        True if created successfully.

      • deleteReplicaGroup

        boolean deleteReplicaGroup(String serviceName,
                           int epoch)
        This method should result in all state corresponding to serviceName being deleted
        Parameters:
        serviceName -
        epoch -
        Returns:
        True if deleted without errors.

      • getReplicaGroup

        Set<NodeIDType> getReplicaGroup(String serviceName)
        This method must return the replica group that was most recently successfully created for the serviceName using createReplicaGroup.
        Parameters:
        serviceName -
        Returns:
        Set of nodes in the replica group for serviceName.
